h2_title: How to Find the Water-Wood Beast
h1_content: Water-Wood Beast is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This hidden beast lurks beneath the water and will try to catch you by surprise as much as it can.
h2_content:
To the left of the area where you first saw the Feng-Tail General.") You're going to want to find where the river ends, which is where it widens and becomes a circle.
As you approach it, you should see a small lot of bubbles coming up from the center of it. When you get closer to it, the Water-Wood Beast will appear.

The sub-section is titled 'How to Find the Water-Wood Beast', and the detailed content is as follows:
To the left of the area where you first saw the Feng-Tail General.") You're going to want to find where the river ends, which is where it widens and becomes a circle.
As you approach it, you should see a small lot of bubbles coming up from the center of it. When you get closer to it, the Water-Wood Beast will appear.
